name: Climbing Simulator 2022
description:
Climbing Simulator 2022 

Use the highlighted keys to move to nearby holds, manage your chalk and keep your stamina in check in one of the newest simulation and simulation-like titles of the year: Climbing Simulator 2022! 

The assets used for the making of Climbing Simulator 2022 include "Low Poly Ultimate Pack" by polyperfect for the player model, and "Final IK" for the inverse kinematics. 

Songs used (all copyright free):

Mihai Popa: models & programming

Andrei Condor: sound & design
